snippet: Two-times Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova will not be able to play competitive tennis for around six months, a Czech news website said, citing the surgeon who operated on Kvitova's playing hand after it was injured in a knife-attack....
lead_paragraph: Two-times Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova will not be able to play competitive tennis for around six months, a Czech news website said, citing the surgeon who operated on Kvitova's playing hand after it was injured in a knife-attack.

headline.main: Kvitova Faces Around Six Months Away From Competition: Czech News Website, Citing Surgeon
headline.print_headline: Kvitova Faces Around Six Months Away From Competition: Czech News Website, Citing Surgeon
